Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.AbsGameBoard
      • cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.GameBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameBoard
    public class GameBoard
extends AbsGameBoard
implements IGameBoard
    This class keeps track of an individual cell on a game board thus representing the game board

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameBoard​(int numRows, int numColumns, int numToWin)
      This class represents an individual cell on a game board, as well as the entire game board itself.

      Places the character p in column c.

        public GameBoard​(int numRows,
                 int numColumns,
                 int numToWin)
        This class represents an individual cell on a game board, as well as the entire game board itself.
        Parameters:
        numRows - the number of rows for the game board
        numColumns - the number of columns for the game board
        numToWin - the number of tokens in a row needed to win

      • placeToken

        public void placeToken​(char p,
                       int c)
        Description copied from interface: IGameBoard
        Places the character p in column c. The token will be placed in the lowest available row in column c.
        Specified by:
        placeToken in interface IGameBoard
        Parameters:
        p - The player's token (e.g. 'X' or 'O').
        c - The column to place the token in.

      • whatsAtPos

        public char whatsAtPos​(BoardPosition pos)
        Description copied from interface: IGameBoard
        Returns the character that is in the GameBoard at the specified position. If no marker is present at the position, a blank space character is returned.
        Specified by:
        whatsAtPos in interface IGameBoard
        Parameters:
        pos - the BoardPosition to check for a marker
        Returns:
        the character at the specified position, or a blank space character if no marker is present
